name: Ikaros Muuhi
text: On Play: If your leader's type is "New Fishman Pirates", play up to 1 4 cost or lower "Fishman" character card from your hand. Then, add the top card of your life to your hand.

effect.text: If your leader's type is "New Fishman Pirates", play up to 1 4 cost or lower "Fishman" character card from your hand. Then, add the top card of your life to your hand.
